message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
Considering the inflation, I think this is a fair deal for both of us. You lose more value each round, so it's wise to accept this offer.
The tables have turned, Bob. I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you $45. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains even more!

Inflation is taking a bigger toll on your potential gains, Alice. I'm willing to take a bit more, considering the circumstances. This might be the best deal you'll get, given the decreasing value of the money.
